storyInfo: Moved by a song she hears, Frostleaf wants to figure out what the lyrics mean, and learns to read.

attributes.content: ...We're already done? No missions for me today either?
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: Like Dr. Kal'tsit said, just be a good patient and get some rest. Your missions can wait till then.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: How long are we talking here?
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: Based on your latest tests... you'll require more than a month to recover from your anemia and malnutrition, not to mention your old injuries...
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: It's best that you refrain from any strenuous activities until you fully recover. We'll arrange for your rehab too, so you don't have to worry about that either while you rest.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: More than a month...? But Doctor, I was hired as a mercenary.
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: I was told there would be missions for me. I'm here to earn my meals, but instead I'm just seeing a doctor and... resting? I don't have the money to pay for treatment anyway.
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: Hm? The onboarding contract should've mentioned that the costs of treatment would be deducted from your salary on a monthly basis. Were you not aware?
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: 'Salary'? What's that mean?
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: Huh? It's your wages, or remuneration? Uh, pay? You know what I mean?
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Uh, yeah, I know what 'pay' is.
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: Something's not right here. Didn't HR explain the contract before you signed it?
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: What's there to explain? I work, you give me money. Back in the unit, those pieces of paper were only to state how many of us there were and how much we'd get paid.
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: ...No, that's not how it works. I suggest you go back to HR and let them explain the contract in detail. Not just about the money, but other important terms and conditions you need to be aware of.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: I've had employers who refused to pay before, but you guys...
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: Frostleaf scans Rhodes Island's massive and sophisticated interior.
I've never seen something so huge that can still move, so you guys can definitely afford it.
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: I just wish I could get assigned a mission soon, or I'll feel strange...
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: Why do I feel like we keep talking past each other? If you don't want to visit HR, I can only do my part as a doctor and suggest you to head over, and be sure to note down anything you need to be careful of during your recuperation.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: As for now, if you're feeling uneasy, you could always chat with your roommates, or maybe take a stroll on the deck.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: There are different facilities and activity spaces on the middle floors, like the Rec Room, the Reading Room... Go take a look, and enjoy your new life!
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Hm? Is there anything else?
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: I just...
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: Never mind, it's nothing.
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: Alright, I'll be heading off then!
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: (I have nothing at all to do... A month of rest time, to enjoy a new life?...What does that even mean?)
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: ('HR,' 'Rec Room,' 'Reading Room.' Where exactly am I supposed to find those? I can't even read the signs on the doors.)
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: Add flour, then sugar, then stir it all up~
attributes.name: Happy Voice

attributes.content: Beagle, make sure not to mistake the fleur de sel for powdered sugar this time!
attributes.name: Happy Voice

attributes.content: I-I won't!
attributes.name: Flustered Voice

attributes.content: You're the one who brought up the idea of baking Fang a birthday cookie, but yours ended up exploding in the oven!
attributes.name: Flustered Voice

attributes.content: Hm? No, that was a special surprise~
attributes.name: Happy Voice

attributes.content: ...I don't think I'd consider that a birthday surprise.
attributes.name: Serious Voice

attributes.content: You say that now, but I remember how much you were laughing!
attributes.name: Happy Voice

attributes.content: ...We should keep our voices down. I think we're disturbing that Vulpo over there.
attributes.name: Serious Voice

attributes.content: Ah, sorry, mate! Wasn't on purpose! Say, you wanna join us?
attributes.name: Happy Voice

attributes.content: Ah, me?
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: Frostleaf looks at the neatly arranged ingredients not far from her.
I don't get it. With those ingredients, you could definitely make some simpler food that'd take less time and provide more calories.
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: Why waste so much effort making something so crumbly that's hard to carry...
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: Then, what about this scent? Does it help you relax?
attributes.name: Warm Voice

attributes.content: It was made with the orchids you grew yourself. From planting the seeds to the first bloom, this fragrance wouldn't have been possible without you tending to them daily.
attributes.name: Warm Voice

attributes.content: The Medical Department usually recommends patients come here often, for a stroll. Whether the aromatherapy or the plants, both are beneficial for your health.
attributes.name: Warm Voice

attributes.content: Miss Vulpo, you've been standing over there for a while now, is the scent not to your liking? Or would you perhaps like a flower of your own to grow? I can teach you how to take care of it.
attributes.name: Warm Voice

attributes.content: No... It smells nice, and light.
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: And thanks, but even if I learned to grow flowers, I don't see myself doing it much... Flowers aren't really useful for anything.
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: And even if I were growing wheat, I've never stayed in one place for long, so I wouldn't be the one eating it.
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: (I can't understand what these instructions are saying... All I remember is to take three of them every day, and the doctor said it should be after meals? Or was it before? And I have to finish them.)
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: (There are so many pills... I can't tell them apart, so I'll just take them all together. I've always taken medicine like this, and I always feel fine the next day after getting some sleep.)
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: Wait! What are you doing? You can't just mix those pills!
attributes.name: Anxious Voice

attributes.content: Don't they come with instructions? How could you... Oh... can you not read them? I know, do you have a notebook? I'll draw a visual aid for you!
attributes.name: Anxious Voice

attributes.content: Rest assured, I've done this for plenty of other operators! Although I'm just a medical intern, I guarantee my drawings are distinctive and easy to understand!
attributes.name: Anxious Voice

attributes.content: Look, this one means to take before meals, and the empty bowl means to take them after. I hope you know numbers at least? Okay, I'll just write how many to take here!
attributes.name: Anxious Voice

attributes.content: ...Thank you.
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: I didn't think to bother you with something so small. Usually I figure this stuff out on my own.
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: I'll remember all this, so don't worry, I won't be bothering you anymore.
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: (Okay, there's a red flowerpot here, and the plant in it is half-withered and has short round leaves. This is where I get treatment. The word on the doorplate looks like a tail, I'll remember that.)
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: (Turn right, and go straight in when I see a red door. Then turn left at a blue door. There should be a shelf nearby, where the plants have drooping leaves, and that's where I get my pills.)
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: (The door with the yellow plants is the Logistics Department for getting daily necessities. The doorplate with words that look a little like two burdenbeasts is the Training Room, where I can do my rehab exercises.)
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: (I can remember all these the old way. I don't need anyone to draw me a map. People who rely too much on others always end up being left behind by their teammates, sooner or later.)
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: (The faster I learn all this and meet their goals, the sooner I can get back to the battlefield and work.)
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: We got approval from Logistics? That's great!
attributes.name: Excited Operator

attributes.content: We can finally get rid of all these old doorplates! And those flowers; it's so hard to grow them without any sunlight in here. Like I've been saying, we should've just given them to the operators to grow themselves!
attributes.name: Excited Operator

attributes.content: Alright, let's get going and grab our stuff from Logistics so we can clean this place up properly!
attributes.name: Happy Operator

attributes.content: (...When will I be considered well enough to start going on missions?)
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: (I'm a mercenary, aren't I? I've been here so long, and what am I doing? I spend my days making sweets, growing flowers, and being dragged off to pet small animals... What use is all this?)
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: (I'm supposed to be fighting for them, but it seems like they don't need me at all. And I'm pretty much useless at anything else: whether taking my medicine or finding my way around, I always end up needing somebody's help.)
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: (...What exactly am I here for?)
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: Her roommates are all out on missions, and Frostleaf is alone in the dormitory with a pile of small gifts from operators she doesn't know.

There are a few books and brochures she can't understand, some snacks, a few potted plants, and a pair of headphones. Compared to the packages she would receive as a mercenary, they were both more expensive and less necessary.
Frostleaf puts on the headphones like she had seen someone else do before, as if they could isolate her from all the annoying things in the outside world.
A soothing rhythm and constant humming combine with some incomprehensible words, and Frostleaf hums along with the melody.
♪Hmm...Hm-hmm...♪
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: Phew... I think I've calmed down.
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: (I can't understand the rest.)
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: Frostleaf, I think that's enough training for today. Any more practice might put a strain on your body.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: You're so strong, Frostleaf... You're in the middle of recuperating, but I still can't keep up with you sometimes.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Jessica, she won't be able to practice with you any more for today.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Gotcha, I'll do my best on my own!
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: The methods us wandering mercs use are definitely different from yours, but you're strong too.
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: You really think so?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: The doctor must also be able to tell you're getting stronger, since she's giving me less and less time to spar with you.
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: Right, which is why I must always be here to observe. Over here, Frostleaf, I need to collect some post-exercise data.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: By the way, are you listening to music? I've seen you with headphones on a lot lately. Have you finally found something you enjoy?
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Uh... it's okay? I just feel less on edge after listening to this song.
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: Don't worry, your body is recovering much faster than we expected, so you might even pass the next physical exam.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: For real?
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: But♪...yesterday...shed tears...♪
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: Chasing♪...throw away...♪
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: Seems like you're in high spirits. I got the data I needed, so I'll get going! We're always so busy over at Medical. Just get a bit more rest and you'll be good to go.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Uh, Doctor, I want to ask, do you know this song?
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: What song? ...No, I've never heard it. Why?
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: I just wanted to know what it's about. I feel like it's a peaceful story.
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: I think there's some sort of book sharing session in the activity room right now, maybe you could join them?
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: ...Forget it, I've never needed to read. I just wanted to know what the song is about.
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: Hm... Then I recommend you head over to the reading room. They have some dictionaries you could borrow. Would you like me to take you? Do you know the way?
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: ...I would, if they didn't replace all the plants and doorplates.
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Nothing! I can go by myself, thank you!
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: *muddled pronunciation*? or is it *muddled pronunciation*?
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: A word that looks like weeds, and behind is a hook that looks like a tail... Does this mean 'starry sky'?
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: *muddled pronunciation* ...'lost'...'witness'......
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: 'tears'...'drunk'......
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: 'Tears drunk, look at lost starry sky, light up, passing by crazy young people'......
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: 'Sad light, but it can't be done, throw it away, throw it away, dance and cry'?
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: I've written down the meanings of each word, but what does the line actually mean...?
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: Is it even meant to be understood? Or did I read it wrong? But that's what it says in the dictionary, so there shouldn't be any problems.
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: What's going on...
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: Tears drunk—♪♪Throw away, throw away, dance and cry♪ Um...
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: ...That sounds so weird, and so bad! There's no way they sung it like that. Now I'm even more annoyed!
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: ...I really can't do a single thing right.
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: Frostleaf throws off her headphones in a huff, and a fragmented voice seeps out from the earcups, floating into her ears.
Hm—hm-hmmm♪ Hmm.......hm-hmm......♪
♪Hmm...Hm-hmm...♪
I don't believe it.
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: The gifts from her fellow operators were still piled up on her desk, and Frostleaf takes out a vocabulary book she'd put away in a drawer.
'I, eat, biscuit. Subject, verb, object.'
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: 'I happily eat, the, delicious biscuit. Adverb, article, adjective.'
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: '...Using modifiers can make your sentences more rich and complete.'
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: Then that 'tears drunk' is actually...
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: 'Drunk on tears'? If I add the words before it, 'Why not,' then it becomes 'Why not get drunk on tears'? It's still a weird sentence, but kinda... beautiful?
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: Oh, I read this wrong earlier, this word is supposed to be 'review' —why do they look so similar? 'read, review, browse,' They have similar meanings, and this one looks like a flying fowlbeast.
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: A flying fowlbeast...? Wait, is this the one from the doorplate? ...'Reading Room,' a place where you can read books. Oh... so that's what it means.
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: And that word from the other day that looks like two burdenbeasts, is 'prohibited,' and that means... 'not allowed.'
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: This one is 'movie,' the thing they invited me to last time. And 'catalog,' I've seen this in the cafeteria and infirmary... I got sidetracked. Let's move on.
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: ...Alright, so this line could mean something more like 'We frantically spend our youth, trying to light up the night sky.'
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: 'So why not we get drunk on tears, and pretend to be a cluster of lost stars.'
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: 'Yet we hope to illuminate the other sky.'
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: Huh... I still don't really get it. Why did they say 'Don't look at me, I am just a disappointed person, trying to get you back' at the end?
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: What does that have to do with the stars, the night sky, getting drunk, and being young? The last few lines sound more like what Tom said to Katy after they broke up and he was trying to get her back...
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: I don't get it... what does it mean?
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: Frostleaf lies on the dormitory floor, her gaze wandering aimlessly across the notices and posters put up by her roommates on the walls.
Hmm...?
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: 'Reading Room,' 'prohibited,' 'food and drink,' 'next week,' 'movie to watch,' 'catalog.'
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: Is that what it means? The words I got wrong earlier are here too...
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: Woah, I can understand it?
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: We frantically spend our youth, trying to light up the night sky♪
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: So why not we get drunk on tears, and pretend to be lost stars♪
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: Yet we hope to light up another sky♪
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: It sounds so different now, like the words I heard the other day in that movie...
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: I finally finished checking all of it, and it doesn't seem that complicated. Seems like its just about romance?
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: Sounds like a young person wanting to get back together with their lover after they broke up, and they feel like a lost star...
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: But I don't get what it means to light up the sky... Why would they want to do that?
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: Frostleaf puts away the vocabulary book in her hand, and crumples up several sheets of paper.
She stretches her neck, and walks out of the dormitory, where she had been for a long time.
The hall outside is still a hall, and the room is still a room, but—
'Instructions for Rhodes Island Operators'
'Today's Cafeteria Menu, featuring a Leithanian head chef!'
'Oranges sent from home, feel free to eat them!'
'Don't forget about the event in Perfumer's garden today!'
'The snack shelf has been restocked!'
She suddenly realizes she can understand all these previously meaningless symbols. The doorplates, the menus, the notices, they all have their own meanings.
In a way, it felt as if she suddenly belonged here.
Oh, Frostleaf! Where are you headed?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: I, I... Hold on, Frostleaf, wait up!
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: ...'Rec Room'!
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: Like I was saying, Frostleaf, you put too much flour in, and now the meringue has collapsed and the biscuits are gonna come out real hard!
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: See, just like I said, right?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: But you did great for your first try!
attributes.name: Beagle

attributes.content: Want to taste it yourself?
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: ...Oh, man! It really is hard as a rock!
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: Pfft, hahaha.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: The meaning of 'Rec Room' is... a super hard biscuit.
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: Frostleaf opens her vocabulary book, and next to the words 'Rec Room,' draws a circle that could be seen as a biscuit with three small figures crowded together.
......'Garden'!
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: You were called Frostleaf, yes?
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: I don't know the meaning behind your codename, but it reminds me of the autumn leaves after the frost descends. Mm, a beautiful image.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Try smelling this fragrance, does it make you feel like you're in a maple forest with snow falling everywhere?
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Mm... smells refreshing... and like dry leaves?
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: That's right, I concocted this one based on your name. It's alright if you didn't enjoy yourself today, but if you ever do spark an interest, you're always welcome.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: 'Garden' means... a maple forest after snow has fallen.
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: Frostleaf flips through the vocabulary book, finds the word 'Garden,' and draws a maple leaf next to it.
......And 'Cafeteria' is......
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: If you can't read the medication instructions, then what about the menu?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Here, I'll explain it item by item. They have separate sections today: this side is by a Victorian chef, and that side is a Columbian chef. They both taste pretty good!
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: But you—you should eat from this section, where the food is both delicious AND nutritious!
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: I'll read out the menu, and then you can decide what to eat, okay?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Thanks...
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: The 'Cafeteria' is a place where I can fill my plate up everyday, with the diagrams Hibiscus drew for my pills.
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: Frostleaf draws a plate of food and a piece of paper covered with words.
Originally full of messy notes, page after page of the vocabulary book is filled with variety of small doodles, as if each word has taken on a new meaning.
Frostleaf!
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Frostleaf—! Don't run away—the instructor told me to tell you we can ramp up our training exercises tomorrow!
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: *pant* *pant*...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Jessica, can I borrow your pen again?
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: Huh? Yeah, here!
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: What are you drawing, a... table?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Yeah, on top of it are 'headphones,' 'vocabulary book,' and 'potted plants.'
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: What's the small pot and shed next to 'wilderness' and the group of people next to 'battlefield'?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Ah, that's my life before I came here. We had a shed out in the wilds, and people would look for us when they needed something done. The lucky ones survived, most would never return.
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: That must have been hard...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Erm...I don't know, actually. It's always been like that, ever since I was small. I was even a little uneasy coming here at first.
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: Um, what did you draw next to the word 'hall'?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: A crying Feline's head.
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: I need to go training!
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: And then... I'll look for Kroos and Perfumer. I have to thank them.
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: And thank you, Jessica! When we're on the battlefield, we'll be epic squadmates!
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: *pant*...*pant*...I finished the long-distance running mission... I feel alright, not too tired.
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: My body should be fully recovered by now.
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: We frantically spend our youth, trying to light up the night sky♪
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: So why not we get drunk on tears, and pretend to be lost stars♪
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: Yet we hope to light up another sky♪
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: Yet we hope to light up another sky♪
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: Hmm... I guess you could interpret the lyrics this way too.
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: I'm like that lost star... but I also hope to light up the sky here.
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: Frostleaf looks up to the sky, the huge ship behind her roaring to life as it prepares to depart for its next destination.
It's time to hand in my application to Dr. Kal'tsit. I'm pretty sure I'm ready to hit the battlefield!
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: This is what the doctors wanted to see, right? My body's in tip-top shape, and I even gained some muscle.
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: And with Engineering to help me repair my weapons, hmm... I might be even better in combat than ever!
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: Dr. Kal'tsit will definitely approve, and I can finally return to battle!
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: Finally... this is what I should be doing!
attributes.name: Frostleaf
